gameview.generalView

Class MenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameview.generalView.MenuBar

  • public class MenuBar
extends java.lang.Object
    The Menubar. It porvid's several functions: 1.Start new game 2. End game 3.language switch 4.surrender 5.pos. thief position function 6.Informations about the product
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A., Jasper Schinghammer

       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> language,
       java.util.List<java.lang.String> languageNames)
        The constructor which is also the init method. It gets the player game view the language map an the language names. Every element is set.
        Parameters:
        pGV - Player game view
        language - Map with language data
        languageNames - List with all language names
